Serialized Fields

doc

org.w3c.dom.Document doc
A field to store the servers XML document root.

xmlFile

java.io.File xmlFile
A field to store the server's XML config file.

inetAddrMap

java.util.HashMap<K,V> inetAddrMap
A field to store the HashMap mapping bind addresses to ConnectionManager instances.

serviceNameMap

java.util.HashMap<K,V> serviceNameMap
A field to store the HashMap mapping service names to ConnectionManager instances.

threadMap

java.util.HashMap<K,V> threadMap
A field to store the HashMap mapping ConnectionManager instances to their Threads.

log

LogManager log
A handle to the log manager instance.

serverThreadGroup

java.lang.ThreadGroup serverThreadGroup
A field to hold the ThreadGroup for all server threads.
